Recaptcha: Force Language

Posted on 17 July 2012 by Andy

Recent problem: customer wanted his reCatpcha forced to german language. First attempt was to set the setting via the RecaptchaOption Script variable. Howewer, for some reason this did not work.

Here is the solution:

<script type="text/javascript" 
src="http://api.recaptcha.net/challenge?k=apiKey<strong>&hl=de</strong>"> 

By adding &hl=de to the "src" URL the language was forced to german.

Tagged: audio, deutsch, german, language, Recaptcha, and sprache by Andy

Remove unwanted preference pages from your RCP app

Posted on 09 July 2012 by Andy

In my recent RCP app some unwanted preferences, contributed from other plugins showed up:

To remove them, just add the following code to your WorkbenchAdvisor class:

public void postStartup(){

  PreferenceManagerpm=PlatformUI.getWorkbench().getPreferenceManager();

  pm.remove( "org.eclipse.help.ui.browsersPreferencePage" ); //remove single contribution

  pm.removeAll(); //just remove all

}

Tagged: PreferencePage and RCP by Andy
